ack.title: Acknowledgements
ack.p: We would like to thank the following individuals for their contributions to this work: Carlos Padron, Gabriel Cardenas, Emelina Martinez, Elisha Ekowo, Frankie Martinez, Carolina Scaramutti, Lillian Rivera, Kira Villamazar, Claudia Jones, Jeffrey Beal, John Brooks, Kate Buchacz, Jon Zibbell and Lisa R. Metsch. The Gilead FOCUS program funded the HIV/HCV screening and linkage to care. AIDS Healthcare Foundation, CAN Community Health, Elton John AIDS Foundation, and MAC AIDS Foundation funded the response to transmission network. The scholarly work was funded by Sylvester Comprehensive Cancer Center at the University of Miami.
